name: The Lost Socks
description:
Two inseparable twin socks! Someone in the room forgot to close the window and because of this a strong wind rose and carried them in different directions. Help them get to each other.

a d \ arrows (left, right) - player controll
z - switch socks
x - turn on \ off switch
space - jump
hold space - long jump
r - restart
escape - pause

(a small square is a switch)
(if the game screen goes abroad, then lower the height of the game window)
